channel.title: Posts on Jack Jamison
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jack Jamison

item.title: First Blog Post
item.description: Welcome to my website. I’ve just set this up to hold my porfolio, but I plan on including blog posts and articles about what I am working on. This website is built in Hugo. I’m still learning markdown, and how to combine it with custom hugo html, so my future posts should be less barebones. Jack Jamison
item.content:
Welcome to my website. I’ve just set this up to hold my porfolio, but I plan on including blog posts and articles about what I am working on. This website is built in Hugo. I’m still learning markdown, and how to combine it with custom hugo html, so my future posts should be less barebones.

Jack Jamison
